name: Sailor Moon S Season 3: Premonition of the Apocalypse: The Mysterious New Guardians Appear
short_description: A new enemy called the Death Busters appears, an organization whose members aim to get their hands on the talismans that can only be found in pure-hearted humans. If they succeed, they will be able to obtain the Holy Grail and use it to take over the entire world.
